title: Tagalog to French Translation - Easy Mode
description: Test your skills in translating basic Tagalog words into French. This quiz is designed for beginners.
instructions: Write the French translation of the word.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.
